title: Skin Boost in New layout?
body: I can't seem to find the skin boost button anymore with the new layout. I like the new layout looks nice clean a bit more pop, but I just can't for the life of me find that button. Is it gone? Can anyone help?

replies.body: This might not be available yet in the updated client.  You should be able to through the legacy client in the meantime, or continue helping test other features until it's available.  Be sure to offer any reports and feedback as well through the[ client discussion b](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)oards.  Thanks!
Oh I see! Thank you sorry for not posting it in the correct forum and I appreciate the response.
